article.title: Midsommar and The Farewell: Bringing Eastern Values to Western Film
article.author: Eric Bai
article.excerpt: For an example of how the cultural zeitgeist may be shifting, let’s look at two American films released in 2019.

authors.bio: A Canadian software engineer in New York. I watch a lot of movies.
